original_text:
when my path was drenched with cream
    and the rock poured out for me streams of olive oil.
korean_text: 젖으로 내 발자취를 씻으며 바위가 나를 위하여 기름 시내를 쏟아냈으며

sentences.original_text: when my path was drenched with cream
sentences.korean_translation: 내 길이 크림에 흠뻑 젖었을 때

sentences.original_text: and the rock poured out for me streams of olive oil
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바위가 나를 위해 올리브油 시냇물을 쏟아냈을 때
